strategy: Tyranid armies have a Strategy Rating of 1.
Initiative: The Nexus Swarm has an Initiative Rating of 1+. All other Tyranid formations have an Initiative Rating of 2+. In addition, all formations are subject to the 'Hive Mind' special rule.

formations.name: Tyrant Swarm
extraUnits: Replace the Hive Tyrant with a Hive Tyrant Shrike: Free
0-1 Hive Tyrant in the army may be replaced with the Dagon Overlord: 75 points
Replace the Dagon Overlord with a Dagon Overlord Shrike: Free
Transport the formation in a Mycetic Spore (all units must be able to be transported) and deploy via planetary assault rules from a Razorfiend or Hive Ship: 50 points

formations.name: Assault Swarm
extraUnits: 1+ Gaunts, Gargoyles, or Bio-Support must be chosen
Replace two Tyranid Warriors with Tyranid Warrior Shrikes: Free
Replace two Tyranid Warriors with Zoanthropes: 25pts
Transport the formation in a Mycetic Spore (all units must be able to be transported) and deploy via planetary assault rules from a Razorfiend or Hive Ship: 50 points

sections.name: Secondary Synapse Swarms
sections.description: Up to one Secondary Synapse Swarm for each Primary Synapse Swarm.

formations.name: Nest Swarm
extraUnits: One to two Instinctive Swarms chosen from Gaunts, Gargoyles, Bio-Support, or Bio-Artillery

formations.name: Breacher Swarm
extraUnits: One to two Instinctive Swarms chosen from Gaunts, Gargoyles, Burrower, Carnifex or Bio-Attack

formations.name: Infestation Swarm
formations.units: Three Ravener Alphas or one Trygon Prime
extraUnits: One to two Burrower Instinctive Swarms

formations.name: Harasser Swarm
extraUnits: Zero to two Instinctive Swarms chosen from Gargoyles or Bio-Flyers

sections.name: Common Independent Swarms
sections.description: Up to one Common Independent Swarm for each Primary Synapse Swarm. No more than a third of the army.

formations.name: Genestealer Swarm
extraUnits: Add up to three Genestealers: 25 points each

sections.name: Rare Independent Swarms
sections.description: Up to one Rare Independent Swarm for each Primary Synapse Swarm. No more than a third of the army.

formations.name: Bio-Titan
extraUnits: Replace the Hierophant with a Hydraphant Bio-Titan: 100 points

formations.name: Bio-Vessel
extraUnits: Replace the Razorfiend with a Hive Ship: Free

upgrades.title: Instinctive Swarms
upgrades.description: It is compulsory to buy the minimum amount of Instinctive Swarms.

items.name: Gaunts
items.description: Five Termagants, five Barbgaunts, or five Hormagaunts

items.name: Bio-Flyers
items.description: Three Harpies or three Hive Crones

items.name: Carnifex
items.description: two Barbed Carnifex or two Screamer-Killer Carnifex

items.name: Bio-Attack
items.description: Two Haruspex, two Exocrines, or two Malefactors

items.name: Breacher
items.description: One Barbed Hierodule or one Scythed Hierodule
